header: Oracles concerning Babylon, Edom, and Arabia

verse: The oracle concerning the wilderness of the sea.
The oracle concerning the desert plain.
For thus the Lord said to me: Within a year, according to the years of a hired worker, all the glory of Kedar will come to an end;
and the remaining bows of Kedarâ€™s warriors will be few; for the Lord, the God of Israel, has spoken.
